content: What is the name of the largest moon in our solar system, which also shares its name with a character from Greek mythology?

I think I know the answer to this! The largest moon in our solar system is Ganymede. And, interestingly, Ganymede is also a figure from Greek mythology. In the myth, he was a beautiful youth who was kidnapped by Zeus and taken to Olympus. So, it seems like the moon is named after this character. Is that correct?
